TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WindowsRuntimeMarshal extends System.Object
public ref class WindowsRuntimeMarshal abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于在 .NET Framework 与 Windows 运行时之间封送数据的帮助程序方法。

span.span: Provides helper methods for marshaling data between the .NET Framework and the Windows Runtime.

param.name: type
param.span: 获取激活接口的对象的 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 类型。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] type to get the activation factory interface for.

summary.span: 返回指定的 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 类型实现工厂接口激活的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that implements the activation factory interface for the specified [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] type.

returns.span: 一个对象，实现激活工厂接口。

span.span: An object that implements the activation factory interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了在异常部分中，异常之外任何`HRESULT`以外`S_OK`返回由基础的工厂方法将作为封送异常。In addition to the exceptions in the Exceptions section, any `HRESULT` other than `S_OK` that is returned by the underlying factory method will be marshaled as an exception.

span.span: For example, the .winmd file was located, but the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] failed to locate the implementation.
